text: Charles Creswell (10 March 1813 – 22 November 1882) was an English cricketer who played first-class cricket from 1836 to 1843. Mainly associated with Nottinghamshire, he made 12 known appearances in first-class matches.CricketArchive. Retrieved on 4 December 2008. He represented the North in the North v. South series. ==References== Category:1813 births Category:1882 deaths Category:English cricketers Category:English cricketers of 1826 to 1863 Category:Nottinghamshire cricketers Category:North v South cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Nottingham
title: Charles Creswell
